creator: werbung@kuhnle.net
text:
Batik does not compile with JDK 1.5. This patch resolves this with an upgrade to
Ant 1.6.2 and patches to the build files.

creator: werbung@kuhnle.net
text:
Created attachment 15047
Path for the build files

Created attachment 15048
ant-1.6.2.jar for lib/ directory
creator: werbung@kuhnle.net
werbung@kuhnle.net
text:
Created attachment 15049
ant-launcher-1.6.2.jar for lib/ directory
Batik 'trunk' should now build under JDK 1.5 (aka Java 5.0).
creator: deweese@apache.org
